Class PurgeStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • byps.BValueClass
      • de.elo.ix.client.ValueClass
        • de.elo.ix.client.PurgeStatus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PurgeStatus
extends ValueClass
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class represents the status of the ELOdm purge task
    Since:
    8.00.032.001
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.String errorMessage
      an error message, if an error occured, else an empty String
      protected boolean isRunning
      if the ELOdm purge task is running (it can only run in combination with the backup task)
      protected java.lang.String lastPurgeTime
      last purge work time (ISO UTC date and time without dots) If no purge has been done yet, the variable is empty.
      protected int numberOfDocsPurged
      number of purged documents

        changedMembers, dbHelper, FLAG_SEALED, flags
